alert.note: Alert for Fresno; Madera (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 12 at 4:58PM PDT until March 12 at 5:30PM PDT by NWS Hanford
info.description: The National Weather Service in Hanford CA has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Madera County in central California... Central Fresno County in central California... * Until 530 PM PDT. * At 458 PM PDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 10 miles southwest of Madera, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Fresno, Madera, Kerman and Biola. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
